pr_title: Support composite actuator contributor for multiple Pub/Sub templates.

timeline.message: add support for composite actuator contributor; refactored and added tests

timeline.author: meltsufin
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -34,21 +38,23 @@
  * {@link PubSubHealthIndicator}.
  *
  * @author Vinicius Carvalho
+ * @author Elena Felder
  *
  * @since 1.2.2
  */
-@Configuration
+@Configuration(proxyBeanMethods = false)

replies.bodyText:
Unrelated to the PR, but Spring Boot classes turn off bean proxying wherever possible for performance and to avoid tripping graal incompatibilities, so I tacked it on here.
proxyBeanMethods being on is only useful if you call bean-producing methods directly in autoconfiguration, which we definitely don't here.
replies.author: elefeint

replies.bodyText: OK, thanks! We should probably then consider doing this across all of our autoconfigs.
replies.author: meltsufin
